1.title: The many meanings of criminology

episode of.title: Criminology: the Study of Doughnuts (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Criminology is the study of crime, criminals and criminal justice. This course focuses criminology from a sociological perspective. Let us share with you the state of the art in the study of crime.
